verses.verse: Now in the twenty <S%H6242><s%> and fourth <S%H702><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of this month <S%H2320><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were assembled <S%H622><s%> with fasting <S%H6685><s%>, and with sackcloth <S%H8242><s%>, and earth upon them <S%H127><s%>.

And the seed <S%H2233><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> separated <S%H914><s%> themselves from all foreigners <S%H1121><s%>, and stood <S%H5975><s%> and confessed <S%H3034><s%> their sins <S%H2403><s%>, and the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>.

And they stood up <S%H6965><s%> in their place <S%H5977><s%>, and read <S%H7121><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%> a fourth part <S%H7243><s%> of the day <S%H3117><s%>; and another fourth part <S%H7243><s%> they confessed <S%H3034><s%>, and worshipped <S%H7812><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%>.

Then stood up <S%H6965><s%> upon the stairs <S%H4608><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, Jeshua <S%H3442><s%>, and Bani <S%H1137><s%>, Kadmiel <S%H6934><s%>, Shebaniah <S%H7645><s%>, Bunni <S%H1138><s%>, Sherebiah <S%H8274><s%>, Bani <S%H1137><s%>, and Chenani <S%H3662><s%>, and cried <S%H2199><s%> with a loud <S%H1419><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%>.

Then the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, Jeshua <S%H3442><s%>, and Kadmiel <S%H6934><s%>, Bani <S%H1137><s%>, Hashabneiah <S%H2813><s%>, Sherebiah <S%H8274><s%>, Hodiah <S%H1941><s%>, Shebaniah <S%H7645><s%>, and Pethahiah <S%H6611><s%>, said <S%H559><s%>, Stand up <S%H6965><s%> and bless <S%H1288><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> from everlasting <S%H5769><s%> to everlasting <S%H5769><s%>; and blessed <S%H1288><s%> be thy glorious <S%H3519><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>, which is exalted <S%H7311><s%> above all blessing <S%H1293><s%> and praise <S%H8416><s%>.

Thou art Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, even thou alone <S%H6213><s%>; thou hast made heaven <S%H8064><s%>, the heaven <S%H8064><s%> of heavens <S%H8064><s%>, with all their host <S%H6635><s%>, the earth <S%H776><s%> and all things that are thereon <S%H3220><s%>, the seas and all that is in them <S%H2421><s%>, and thou preservest them all <S%H6635><s%>; and the host of heaven <S%H8064><s%> worshippeth thee <S%H7812><s%>.

Thou art Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%>, who didst choose <S%H977><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%>, and broughtest him forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Ur <S%H218><s%> of the Chaldees <S%H3778><s%>, and gavest <S%H7760><s%> him the name <S%H8034><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%>,

and foundest <S%H4672><s%> his heart <S%H3824><s%> faithful <S%H539><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee <S%H3772><s%>, and madest a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with him to give <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%>, the Hittite <S%H2850><s%>, the Amorite <S%H567><s%>, and the Perizzite <S%H6522><s%>, and the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%>, and the Girgashite <S%H1622><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> it unto his seed <S%H2233><s%>, and hast performed <S%H6965><s%> thy words <S%H1697><s%>; for thou art righteous <S%H6662><s%>.

And thou sawest <S%H7200><s%> the affliction <S%H6040><s%> of our fathers <S%H1><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and heardest <S%H8085><s%> their cry <S%H2201><s%> by the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%>,

and showedst <S%H5414><s%> signs <S%H226><s%> and wonders <S%H4159><s%> upon Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and on all his servants <S%H5650><s%>, and on all the people <S%H5971><s%> of his land <S%H776><s%>; for thou knewest <S%H3045><s%> that they dealt proudly <S%H2102><s%> against them <S%H6213><s%>, and didst get thee a name <S%H8034><s%>, as it is this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And thou didst divide <S%H1234><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them <S%H5674><s%>, so that they went through the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> on the dry land <S%H3004><s%>; and their pursuers <S%H7291><s%> thou didst cast <S%H7993><s%> into the depths <S%H4688><s%>, as a stone <S%H68><s%> into the mighty <S%H5794><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>.

Moreover in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of cloud <S%H6051><s%> thou leddest <S%H5148><s%> them by day <S%H3119><s%>; and in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>, to give them light <S%H215><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> wherein they should go <S%H3212><s%>.

Thou camest down <S%H3381><s%> also upon mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, and spakest <S%H1696><s%> with them from heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and gavest <S%H5414><s%> them right <S%H3477><s%> ordinances <S%H4941><s%> and true <S%H571><s%> laws <S%H8451><s%>, good <S%H2896><s%> statutes <S%H2706><s%> and commandments <S%H4687><s%>,

and madest known <S%H3045><s%> unto them thy holy <S%H6944><s%> sabbath <S%H7676><s%>, and commandedst <S%H6680><s%> them commandments <S%H4687><s%>, and statutes <S%H2706><s%>, and a law <S%H8451><s%>, by <S%H3027><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%>,

and gavest <S%H5414><s%> them bread <S%H3899><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%> for their hunger <S%H7458><s%>, and broughtest forth <S%H3318><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> for them out of the rock <S%H5553><s%> for their thirst <S%H6772><s%>, and commandedst <S%H559><s%> them that they should go in <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which thou hadst sworn <S%H3027><s%> to give them <S%H5414><s%>.
But they and our fathers <S%H1><s%> dealt proudly <S%H2102><s%> and hardened <S%H7185><s%> their neck <S%H6203><s%>, and hearkened <S%H8085><s%> not to thy commandments <S%H4687><s%>,

and refused <S%H3985><s%> to obey <S%H8085><s%>, neither were mindful <S%H2142><s%> of thy wonders <S%H6381><s%> that thou didst <S%H6213><s%> among them <S%H7185><s%>, but hardened their neck <S%H6203><s%>, and in their rebellion <S%H4805><s%> appointed <S%H5414><s%> a captain <S%H7218><s%> to return <S%H7725><s%> to their bondage <S%H5659><s%>. But thou art a God <S%H433><s%> ready to pardon <S%H5547><s%>, gracious <S%H2587><s%> and merciful <S%H7349><s%>, slow <S%H750><s%> to anger <S%H639><s%>, and abundant <S%H7227><s%> in lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>, and forsookest them not <S%H5800><s%>.

Yea <S%H6213><s%>, when they had made them a molten <S%H4541><s%> calf <S%H5695><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, This is thy God <S%H430><s%> that brought thee up <S%H5927><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and had wrought <S%H6213><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> provocations <S%H5007><s%>;

yet thou in thy manifold <S%H7227><s%> mercies <S%H7356><s%> forsookest <S%H5800><s%> them not in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>: the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of cloud <S%H6051><s%> departed <S%H5493><s%> not from over them by day <S%H3119><s%>, to lead <S%H5148><s%> them in the way <S%H1870><s%>; neither the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>, to show them light <S%H215><s%>, and the way <S%H1870><s%> wherein they should go <S%H3212><s%>.

Thou gavest <S%H5414><s%> also thy good <S%H2896><s%> Spirit <S%H7307><s%> to instruct <S%H7919><s%> them <S%H4513><s%>, and withheldest not thy manna <S%H4478><s%> from their mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and gavest <S%H5414><s%> them water <S%H4325><s%> for their thirst <S%H6772><s%>.

Yea <S%H705><s%>, forty years <S%H8141><s%> didst thou sustain <S%H3557><s%> them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and they lacked <S%H2637><s%> nothing <S%H8008><s%>; their clothes waxed not old <S%H1086><s%>, and their feet <S%H7272><s%> swelled not <S%H1216><s%>.

Moreover thou gavest <S%H5414><s%> them kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> and peoples <S%H5971><s%>, which thou didst allot <S%H2505><s%> after their portions <S%H6285><s%>: so they possessed <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%>, even the land <S%H776><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, and the land <S%H776><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>.

Their children <S%H1121><s%> also multipliedst <S%H7235><s%> thou as the stars <S%H3556><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and broughtest <S%H935><s%> them into the land <S%H776><s%> concerning which thou didst say <S%H559><s%> to their fathers <S%H1><s%>, that they should go in <S%H935><s%> to possess it <S%H3423><s%>.

So the children <S%H1121><s%> went in <S%H935><s%> and possessed <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, and thou subduedst <S%H3665><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>, and gavest <S%H5414><s%> them into their hands <S%H3027><s%>, with their kings <S%H4428><s%>, and the peoples <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, that they might do <S%H6213><s%> with them as they would <S%H7522><s%>.

And they took <S%H3920><s%> fortified <S%H1219><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>, and a fat <S%H8082><s%> land <S%H127><s%>, and possessed <S%H3423><s%> houses <S%H1004><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of all good things <S%H2898><s%>, cisterns <S%H953><s%> hewn <S%H2672><s%> out <S%H3754><s%>, vineyards, and oliveyards <S%H2132><s%>, and fruit <S%H3978><s%> - trees <S%H6086><s%> in abundance <S%H7230><s%>: so they did eat <S%H398><s%>, and were filled <S%H7646><s%>, and became fat <S%H8080><s%>, and delighted <S%H5727><s%> themselves in thy great <S%H1419><s%> goodness <S%H2898><s%>.

Nevertheless they were disobedient <S%H4784><s%>, and rebelled <S%H4775><s%> against thee <S%H7993><s%>, and cast thy law <S%H8451><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> their back <S%H1458><s%>, and slew <S%H2026><s%> thy prophets <S%H5030><s%> that testified <S%H5749><s%> against them to turn <S%H7725><s%> them again unto thee <S%H6213><s%>, and they wrought great <S%H1419><s%> provocations <S%H5007><s%>.

Therefore thou deliveredst <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their adversaries <S%H6862><s%>, who distressed <S%H6887><s%> them <S%H6256><s%>: and in the time of their trouble <S%H6869><s%>, when they cried <S%H6817><s%> unto thee <S%H8085><s%>, thou heardest from heaven <S%H8064><s%>; and according to thy manifold <S%H7227><s%> mercies <S%H7356><s%> thou gavest <S%H5414><s%> them saviours <S%H3467><s%> who saved <S%H3467><s%> them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their adversaries <S%H6862><s%>.

But after they had rest <S%H5117><s%>, they did <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee <S%H5800><s%>; therefore leftest thou them in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%>, so that they had the dominion <S%H7287><s%> over them <S%H7725><s%>: yet when they returned, and cried <S%H2199><s%> unto thee <S%H8085><s%>, thou heardest from heaven <S%H8064><s%>; and many <S%H7227><s%> times <S%H6256><s%> didst thou deliver <S%H5337><s%> them according to thy mercies <S%H7356><s%>,

and testifiedst <S%H5749><s%> against them <S%H7725><s%>, that thou mightest bring them again unto thy law <S%H8451><s%>. Yet they dealt proudly <S%H2102><s%>, and hearkened <S%H8085><s%> not unto thy commandments <S%H4687><s%>, but sinned <S%H2398><s%> against thine ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, (which if a man <S%H120><s%> do <S%H6213><s%>, he shall live <S%H2421><s%> in them <S%H5414><s%>), and withdrew the shoulder <S%H3802><s%>, and hardened <S%H7185><s%> their neck <S%H6203><s%>, and would not hear <S%H8085><s%>.

Yet many <S%H7227><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> didst thou bear with them <S%H5749><s%>, and testifiedst against them by thy Spirit <S%H7307><s%> through <S%H3027><s%> thy prophets <S%H5030><s%>: yet would they not give <S%H5414><s%> ear <S%H238><s%>: therefore gavest <S%H5414><s%> thou them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> of the lands <S%H776><s%>.

Nevertheless in thy manifold <S%H7227><s%> mercies <S%H7356><s%> thou didst <S%H6213><s%> not make a full end <S%H3617><s%> of them <S%H5800><s%>, nor forsake them <S%H2587><s%>; for thou art a gracious and merciful <S%H7349><s%> God <S%H410><s%>.

Now therefore <S%H430><s%>, our God, the great <S%H1419><s%>, the mighty <S%H1368><s%>, and the terrible <S%H3372><s%> God <S%H410><s%>, who keepest <S%H8104><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> and lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>, let not all the travail <S%H8513><s%> seem little <S%H4591><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee <S%H4672><s%>, that hath come upon us <S%H4428><s%>, on our kings, on our princes <S%H8269><s%>, and on our priests <S%H3548><s%>, and on our prophets <S%H5030><s%>, and on our fathers <S%H1><s%>, and on all thy people <S%H5971><s%>, since the time <S%H3117><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.
Howbeit thou art just <S%H6662><s%> in all that is come <S%H935><s%> upon us <S%H6213><s%>; for thou hast dealt truly <S%H6213><s%>, but we have done wickedly <S%H7561><s%>;

neither have our kings <S%H4428><s%>, our princes <S%H8269><s%>, our priests <S%H3548><s%>, nor our fathers <S%H1><s%>, kept <S%H6213><s%> thy law <S%H8451><s%>, nor hearkened <S%H7181><s%> unto thy commandments <S%H4687><s%> and thy testimonies <S%H5715><s%> wherewith thou didst testify against them <S%H5749><s%>.

For they have not served <S%H5647><s%> thee in their kingdom <S%H4438><s%>, and in thy great <S%H7227><s%> goodness <S%H2898><s%> that thou gavest <S%H5414><s%> them <S%H7342><s%>, and in the large and fat <S%H8082><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which thou gavest <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them <S%H7725><s%>, neither turned they from their wicked <S%H7451><s%> works <S%H4611><s%>.

Behold <S%H5650><s%>, we are servants this day <S%H3117><s%>, and as for the land <S%H776><s%> that thou gavest <S%H5414><s%> unto our fathers <S%H1><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> thereof and the good <S%H2898><s%> thereof <S%H5650><s%>, behold, we are servants in it.

And it yieldeth much <S%H7235><s%> increase <S%H8393><s%> unto the kings <S%H4428><s%> whom thou hast set <S%H5414><s%> over us because of our sins <S%H2403><s%>: also they have power <S%H4910><s%> over our bodies <S%H1472><s%>, and over our cattle <S%H929><s%>, at their pleasure <S%H7522><s%>, and we are in great <S%H1419><s%> distress <S%H6869><s%>.

And yet for all this we make <S%H3772><s%> a sure <S%H548><s%> covenant <S%H3789><s%>, and write it <S%H8269><s%>; and our princes, our Levites <S%H3881><s%>, and our priests <S%H3548><s%>, seal unto it <S%H2856><s%>.
